message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $13,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However,  $13,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $10,000. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
